alert.note: Alert for Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iroquois County through 630 AM CDT... At 559 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cissna Park, or 9 miles southwest of Milford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in upwards of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milford, Stockland, Wellington and Claytonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
